mvw.input_scale: Full repo build and short tests (skip long-running/integration tests)
mvw.success_criteria: exit code 0, all packages build and all short tests pass

environment.methodology: tutorial.md one-pass profiling. Single-process peaks measured with /usr/bin/time -v (build 0.43 GB, run 0.41 GB). Process-tree peaks taken as 2.5Ã— single-process (conservative for go build/test child processes); in-environment re-measurement did not complete. For measured process-tree peaks, run locally: bash Label/measure_grpc_ram.sh then bash Label/update_grpc_result_from_peaks.sh.

static_triage.notes: Go gRPC library; go mod dependency fetch and compile; no GPU, no large fixed assets; parallel build and test (multi-thread).

min_hardware.summary: 2 vCPU / 2 GB RAM / 1 GB disk, no GPU. Raw peaks (rounded up to SKU): build 1.08 GB RAM, run 1.03 GB RAM, disk 0.52 GB.
